mapper.select: /* AdmUserRegMapper.selectUserRegListCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1
/* AdmUserRegMapper.selectUserRegList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* AdmUserRegMapper.selectUserRegHistList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* AdmUserRegMapper.selectUserRegExcel */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
